meaningMnemonic: Remember 大阪 (Osaka)? This is the <kanji>dialect</kanji> they speak, making this word <vocabulary>Osaka dialect</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: If you know how to read 大阪 you can just add 弁 to it and be able to read the whole thing, though maybe not in <vocabulary>Osaka dialect</vocabulary>. Okay, fine, it's probably the same thing in Osaka dialect.
